name: Theater Puppet Maker
desc: After all allies uses a total of 6 Ultimate(s) while not under the "Overclock" effect, gains "Overclock": After attacking with an Ultimate, deals 3 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 130% of the attacker's ATK to attacked targets. After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The first character in the team lineup activates their Ultimate, Charges Brain in a Vat to 200%, and can use their Ultimate 4 times before the status ends for them.
